title: The Halloween Show! Week 8 Studs & Duds + Fantasy Greed - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/31
description:
Happy Halloween! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason review the Week 8 NFL action! Which spooky studs and dastardly duds are for real? Plus, a special Halloween edition of Monday Punday, the latest injury news, and more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 31st, 2022.
